content: Is there a list or overview of FHIR meetups somwhere?

Our virtual FHIR meetup about Structured Data Capture (SDC) in FHIR® is tomorrow (on Tuesday). We made the time convenient for European attendees as well. Please join us here: https://www.meetup.com/HealthDev/events/272108850/. Send me a message if you want to join speakers' zoom.

HI
In case you missed our latest FHIR® meetup go check the videos

FHIR Profiling with Trifolia-on-FHIR https://youtu.be/P6tuJUVECBA
FHIR Profiling & Validation with zen-lang https://youtu.be/5CFkbrCjHo8
Creating an Implementation Guide with FHIR Shorthand https://youtu.be/Zh-FlNnavFo

If you would like to contribute your topic feel free to sumbit it here https://www.health-samurai.io/fhir-meetups
Looking forward to catching up about FHIR Async and Queues in one hour! (https://www.health-samurai.io/fhir-meetups)

Hi, just a quick note about our latest FHIR meetup: FHIR® More than REST.

We had an amazing discussion with @Josh Mandel @nicola (RIO/SS) @Paul Church @Ray Duncan @Gino Canessa discussing FHIR Async for CRUDS Interactions & Operations and Queues.

The livestream record is here https://youtu.be/6G2oQJu41Fs

If you would like to contribute your topic feel free to submit it here https://www.health-samurai.io/fhir-meetups

Thanks everyone who joined it. Look forward to seeing you at one of the next meetups!
Is there a calendar for these meetups?

It's been a long journey for all of us since we last met and we're excited to invite you to our next online FHIR® meetup.

Date: March 3, 2022
Time: 12:00 PM - 2:30 PM PT

Large terminologies like SNOMED CT, RxNorm and LOINC are a foundational part of the FHIR applications but there’re still problems with distribution, versioning, updates and management of terminologies. During this meetup we’re going to overview the current state of terminology support in FHIR, discuss challenges that implementers come across when developing and using their solutions.

Lord of the Terms
Speaker: @Grahame Grieve , FHIR product director for HL7 International

Practical approach to FHIR Terminology Services
Speaker: @nicola (RIO/SS) , CTO for Health Samurai

FHIR Terminology Services with Ontoserver
Speaker: @Michael Lawley who leads the Health Informatics Group at the Australian e-Health Research Centre, part of CSIRO, Australia’s National Science Agency.

Platform: Zoom. We want to make it really interactive.

Registration: https://bit.ly/3LBJAK9

See you soon!
